original_text:
when the Almighty was yet with me,
    when my children were all around me,
korean_text: 그 때에는 전능자가 아직도 나와 함께 계셨으며 나의 젊은이들이 나를 둘러 있었으며

sentences.original_text: when the Almighty was yet with me
sentences.korean_translation: 전능하신 분이 아직 나와 함께 계셨을 때

sentences.original_text: when my children were all around me
sentences.korean_translation: 내 자녀들이 내 주위에 모두 있을 때
